label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• EnabledTreant ProtectorinCaptains Mode
  • Towerbase armor reduced by 2
  • Towers now gain 1 more armor per nearby enemy hero (3 total per enemy now)
  • Tower bonus armor based on nearby enemy heroes AoE increased from 1200 to 1400
  • Shrinesbase health regen reduced from 100 to 90
  • IntelligencebasedSpell Amplificationincreased from 1% per 16 Intelligence to 1% per 15
  • XPrequired to go from level 20 to 25 reduced from 10895 to 10000 (1600/1900/2200/2500/2695 to 1500/1750/2000/2250/2500)

label: Hand of Midas
descriptionHtml:
• XP bonus reduced from 2.5× to 1.75×
  • Gold bonus increased from 190 to 220

label: Orb of Venom
descriptionHtml:
• Slow duration reduced from 4 to 3
  • DPS increased from 3 to 5

label: Power Treads
descriptionHtml: • Attribute bonus increased from 9 to 10

label: Quelling Blade
descriptionHtml: • Bonus damage no longer stacks with Iron Talon

label: Tranquil Boots
descriptionHtml:
• Requires Wind Lace instead of Ring of Protection
  • No longer provides armor
  • Active state regeneration increased from 12 to 14
  • Active state movement speed increased from 85 to 90
  • Disabled state movement speed increased from 55 to 65

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml: • Strength gain reduced from 2.5 to 2.3
